SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_CD = ? AND BOARD_ST='N'

SELECT * FROM( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM( SELECT BOARD_NO , BOARD_TITLE, MEMBER_NICK, TO_CHAR(CREATE_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CREATE_DT, READ_COUNT FROM BOARD JOIN MEMBER USING(MEMBER_NO) WHERE BOARD_CD = ? AND BOARD_ST = 'N' ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
